extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GameBoard getGameBoard()
      Returns the current game board.
      int getGameID()
      Returns the game ID.
      boolean getPlayerXTurn()
      Returns whether it is currently Player X's turn.
      void setPlayerXTurn(boolean turnSwitch)
      Takes a boolean argument set by the GameBoard that flips the boolean value for if it's Player X's turn to switch who is next to make a move.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Connect4Logic

        public Connect4Logic()
        Sole constructor. Creates random ID for the game between 100 and 100, creates a new Game Board object, and sets playerXTurn to true.

    • Method Detail

      • getGameID

        public int getGameID()
        Returns the game ID.
        Returns:
        The integer ID for the current game.

      • getGameBoard

        public GameBoard getGameBoard()
        Returns the current game board.
        Returns:
        The GameBoard object for the current game.

      • getPlayerXTurn

        public boolean getPlayerXTurn()
        Returns whether it is currently Player X's turn.
        Returns:
        The boolean representation of if it's Player X's turn.

      • setPlayerXTurn

        public void setPlayerXTurn(boolean turnSwitch)
        Takes a boolean argument set by the GameBoard that flips the boolean value for if it's Player X's turn to switch who is next to make a move.
        Parameters:
        turnSwitch - The opposite boolean of which player just made a move.
